title: What happened to the plans for a fast food restaurant that was to be built beside the new Advance Auto Parts store in Odgen?
text:
Because restaurants and new businesses locating to the area can
change plans by the week or month, we regret to say we can't answer
questions about new stores opening. We will, however, print any news
about new restaurants or businesses in the StarNews and
StarNewsOnline.com when there is information about it. thanks
